title: Conduct a Wind Tunnel Test
description: An aerodynamics engineer needs to test a scale model of a new aircraft design in a wind tunnel to measure lift and drag.

tasks.description: Mount the scale model in the wind tunnel test section and connect all data sensors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the model is securely mounted and all sensors are online.

tasks.description: Run the wind tunnel through a series of predefined airspeeds and angles of attack.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the test plan, setting the correct tunnel conditions for each test point.

tasks.description: Record the sensor data (lift, drag, pressure) for each test point and compile the results for analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects and archives all test data.
